source: In this module, we wanted to cover all the details and important nuances you will need to take care of as an international student. Don’t worry, our staff and faculty (and even other students) will be there for you every step of the way. You will be able to ask questions and get support any time you need it. By now, you must be working hard at getting your visa to Russia. You should have received all the instructions and an invitation letter from the Skoltech Admissions Office and, at this point, should know your approximate arrival date in Moscow. Let’s do a quick recap of what you need for a seamless arrival:
translation: 在本模块中，我们希望涵盖您作为一名国际学生需要处理的所有细节和重要细微之处。不用担心，我们的教职员工（甚至其他学生）都会一路为您提供帮助。您可以在任何需要的时候提出问题并获得支持。现在，您一定正在努力办理赴俄签证。您应该已经收到了来自Skoltech招生办公室的所有指示和邀请函，并且此时应该知道您在莫斯科的大致到达日期。让我们快速回顾一下您顺利抵达所需的内容：

source: 2) Active students can live in the Dormitories on the Skolkovo territory (priority given to international students
translation: 2)  活跃的学生可以住在斯科尔科沃园区的宿舍（优先考虑国际学生）

source: PhD students are allocated in studios, 1 and 2-bedroom apartments in groups of 2-3 people. You will get up to 2 roommates.
translation: 博士生将被安排入住单间公寓、一居室和两居室公寓，每间公寓住2-3人。你最多会有2个室友。

source: In order to use the internet on your first day in Moscow you can use public Wi-Fi. Most streets in the city center, parks and almost all public transport provide free internet access. Wi-Fi networks are available at over 1,000 locations. Each of them will be marked accordingly to keep you informed. To connect, select "Moscow\_Wi-Fi\_Free" among accessible networks, open the browser and register. This can be done through text messages; you should enter your Russian phone number, and receive a text message with a code. We also advise you to bring a powerbank with you (most airlines and railway carriers allow you to carry a 20 000 mAh power bank).
translation: 第一天在莫斯科使用互联网，您可以使用公共Wi-Fi。市中心的大多数街道、公园和几乎所有公共交通工具都提供免费网络接入。Wi-Fi网络覆盖1000多个地点。每个地点都将有相应的标识，方便您识别。连接时，在可用的网络中选择“Moscow\_Wi-Fi\_Free”，打开浏览器并注册。这可以通过短信完成；您需要输入您的俄罗斯手机号码，然后接收包含验证码的短信。我们还建议您携带一个移动电源（大多数航空公司和铁路公司允许携带20000毫安时的移动电源）。

source: Master's students are allocated in 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments in groups of 3-6 people. You will get up to 5 roommates. Allocation conditions for MSc students under the HRH Princess of Thailand program are established in separate regulations.
translation: 硕士生将被分配到1居室、2居室和3居室公寓，每组3-6人。您最多会有5个室友。泰国公主殿下项目下硕士生的分配条件另有规定。

Remember that the academic year will start on September 1st this year, and you must be in town for your first day of studies. Note: foreign students are entitled to apply for an air ticket from a city where they live to the airport of Moscow. This support measure can only be provided once at the year of admission (MSc-1 and PhD-1 only). You can apply for a ticket using HelpDesk. We put links to the help desk in the description of this video.

Remember that the academic year will start on September 1st this year, and you must be in town for your first day of studies. Note: foreign students are entitled to apply for an air ticket from a city where they live to the airport of Moscow. This support measure can only be provided once at the year of admission (MSc-1 and PhD-1 only). You can apply for a ticket using HelpDesk. We put links to the help desk in the description of this video.

source: Do you know where you’re going to live yet? Don’t worry, we’ll help you get oriented and show you different accommodation options (and how to book them). Let’s get started, shall we? First of all, all information regarding accommodation can be found on accommodation.skoltech.ru . But we’ll give you an overview here too, just in case. As always, all the links can be found in the description.
translation: 你知道你打算住在哪里了吗？别担心，我们会帮你熟悉环境，并向你展示不同的住宿选择（以及如何预订）。我们开始吧？首先，所有关于住宿的信息都可以在accommodation.skoltech.ru找到。但以防万一，我们也会在这里给你一个概述。像往常一样，所有链接都可以在描述中找到。

source: If student dorms aren’t your thing, you can always rent an apartment independently.
translation: 如果学生宿舍不适合你，你也可以选择独立租房。

source: Your other option is to live in the Skoltech Dormitory. Here, you will be surrounded by your fellow students, who will always find the time to help solve major issues, or even simply share a meal and dispel boredom with conversation. The dorms are located near the campus, meaning you’re always within walking distance of your classes. Your migration registration also becomes a non-issue, since the dormitory will handle that for you. However, keep in mind that the dorms have their own rules, which were created for the comfort of everyone who lives there.
translation: 您的另一个选择是住在斯科尔科沃科技学院宿舍。在这里，您将被同学们包围，他们总能抽出时间帮助解决重大问题，甚至只是共进晚餐，用谈话驱散无聊。宿舍位于校园附近，这意味着您始终步行即可到达课堂。您的迁移登记也将不再是问题，因为宿舍会为您办理。但是，请记住，宿舍有自己的规章制度，这些制度是为了方便所有居住在那里的人而制定的。

source: You can find a link to Skoltech’s Basic and Development Programs in the description.
translation: 您可以找到Skoltech基础和发展课程的链接在描述中。

source: Other Students (visiting, prospective students) who require short-term accommodation (less than an academic year) are allocated in 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments in groups of 4-6 people. You will get up to 3 roommates. Accommodation for prospective students is free when the student stays for a maximum of 3 nights.
translation: 其他学生（访问学生、潜在学生）需要短期住宿（少于一个学年）的，将被安排入住1、2和3居室公寓，每间公寓住4-6人。您最多会有3个室友。潜在学生的住宿在入住时间不超过3晚的情况下免费。

source: *Text Overlay: Yugo-Zapadnaya, Park Pobedy & Slavyansky Boulevard*
translation: *文字叠加：Yugo-Zapadnaya，Park Pobedy & Slavyansky Boulevard*

source: Students with disabilities are accommodated in specially equipped apartments accompanying a medical assistant or a family member, if approved by the dorm manager/curator.
translation: 经宿舍管理员/宿管批准，残疾学生可入住配备特殊设施的公寓，并可由医疗助理或家人陪同。

source: *Text Overlay: Suggested locations: Tryokhgorka, Odintsovo, Nemchinovka, Novoivanovskoe.*
translation: *文字叠加：建议地点：特里奥霍戈尔卡，奥丁佐沃，涅姆奇诺夫卡，新伊万诺夫斯科耶*

source: As of 2022, foreign-issued bank cards are not accepted in Moscow, so you will not be able to pay with a bank card at the cash register. As you arrive at the airport and pass security, head straight for the currency exchange shop. Don’t exchange all your money, as the exchange rates at the airport are notoriously bad, but do exchange enough for your first day in the city (aka to travel to your accommodation, treat yourself to a meal and buy a cell phone SIM card). You will likely need between 2 500 \- 3 000 RUB. Afterwards, you can find an official bank with a better exchange rate and exchange your currency there.
translation: 截至2022年，莫斯科不接受外国发行的银行卡，因此您无法在收银台使用银行卡付款。抵达机场并通过安检后，直接前往货币兑换商店。不要兑换所有钱，因为机场的汇率非常糟糕，但要兑换足够的钱用于您在城市的第一天（也就是前往您的住处、犒劳自己一顿饭和购买手机SIM卡）。您可能需要2500-3000卢布。之后，您可以找到一家官方银行，那里有更好的汇率，并在那里兑换您的货币。

source: *A map of the subway should go here.*
translation: *地铁线路图应置于此处*

source: ### Text After Video 9
translation: 视频9之后

source: The closest metro stations like Yugo-Zapadnaya, Park Pobedy & Slavyansky Boulevard have bus stops with direct routes to Skolkovo and should get you to the campus within 45 minutes.
translation: 最近的地铁站，例如雨果-扎帕德纳亚站、胜利公园站和斯拉夫大道站，都有直达斯科尔科沃的公交车，大约45分钟内可以到达校园。

source: The dormitory apartment complex is called Palisad, so you will probably hear that name a lot. Palisad is located near the Technopark, which is within a 20 minute walk or a quick 5 minute bus ride. You choose what you like\! Palisad is part of the Skolkovo Innovation Center, which means students get access to the same facilities as all Skolkovo residents:
translation: 宿舍公寓楼叫做Palisad，所以你可能会经常听到这个名字。Palisad位于科技园附近，步行20分钟或乘坐公交车5分钟即可到达。你选择你喜欢的！Palisad是斯科尔科沃创新中心的一部分，这意味着学生可以享受到与所有斯科尔科沃居民相同的设施：

source: Accommodation rates are established once per year and published on the Accommodation Website, the link to which you can find in the description. You can also find the information on reserving a space in standard rooms there. Remember, students that meet the appropriate requirements can get a discount of up to 55% off for master’s students and up to 45% for PhD students.
translation: 住宿费每年制定一次，并公布在住宿网站上，链接可在说明中找到。您也可以在那里找到预订标准间的信息。请记住，符合相应条件的学生可以获得高达55%的硕士生折扣和高达45%的博士生折扣。

source: *Text Overlay: Apartment rental*
translation: *文字叠加：公寓出租*

source: We suggest you choose an area near D1 stations of MCD (Moscow Central Diameters).
translation: 我们建议您选择靠近莫斯科中央直径线 (MCD) D1 线车站的区域。

source: To make it easy for you to navigate Moscow, we have compiled a list of navigation apps for you. Download them beforeyour trip\! To navigate the metro you will need the Yandex Metro (links to an external site)app, for navigation in public transport you will need a Yandex Maps app (links to an external site)and taxi apps like Yandex Taxi (links to an external site). Feel free to download and save this picture of the Moscow Metro map (links to an external site) as well. You can find the links to these applications and sites, as well as information on how to get to your accommodation from the airport below this video.
translation: 为了方便您在莫斯科出行，我们为您整理了一份导航应用列表。请在出行前下载！  您需要Yandex Metro (links to an external site)应用来导航地铁，Yandex Maps应用 (links to an external site)来导航公共交通，以及Yandex Taxi (links to an external site)等打车应用。  也请随意下载并保存这张莫斯科地铁地图图片 (links to an external site)。您可以在此视频下方找到这些应用程序和网站的链接，以及从机场前往您住处的相关信息。

source: You can look for an apartment flat in different districts near Skolkovo: Tryokhgorka, Odintsovo, Nemchinovka, Novoivanovskoe.
translation: 您可以在斯科尔科沃附近的不同地区寻找公寓：特罗伊戈尔卡、奥丁佐沃、涅姆奇诺夫卡、诺沃伊万诺夫斯科耶。

source: You can find a more detailed instruction with links to verified apps, as well advice on safely looking for a place to live below. We have also put the information on the Migration Rules in the description. Please read this section carefully.
translation: 您可以在这里找到更详细的说明，其中包含经过验证的应用程序链接以及关于安全寻找住处的建议。我们还在描述中提供了关于移民规定的信息。请仔细阅读此部分。

source: Apartments are fully equipped for living, including bed linen and kitchen utensils. Cleaning is provided 2 times per month; however, students are fully responsible for keeping the apartment and facilities fully clean and in working order. In addition, there is Wi-Fi in each apartment. Religious attributes, personal electronic devices \[including hairdryer\] and household items and chemicals are to be purchased by students depending on individual needs.
translation: 公寓配备齐全的生活设施，包括床上用品和厨房用具。每月清洁两次；但是，学生需全权负责保持公寓和设施的清洁和完好运转。此外，每间公寓都配备无线网络。宗教用品、个人电子设备（包括吹风机）以及家用物品和化学品需由学生根据个人需求自行购买。

source: The Skoltech library is not only about books for loan, it is an academic hub for learning outside a classroom and doing research outside a lab. It combines digital infrastructure and a self-directed learning space located on the third floor of the Skoltech campus. In the library students can discover, analyze, share information, and create new knowledge. There are designated areas either for group collaboration or silent individual study, which makes the library your go-to place for any type of work. The library’s mission is to provide you with access to knowledge. The library’s key services include:
translation: 斯科尔科沃科技学院图书馆不仅仅是借阅书籍的地方，它还是一个课堂外的学习中心和实验室外的研究中心。它结合了数字基础设施和位于斯科尔科沃科技学院校园三楼的自主学习空间。学生们可以在图书馆里发现、分析、分享信息，并创造新的知识。这里有专门为小组合作或安静的个人学习而设计的区域，这使得图书馆成为您任何类型工作的首选场所。图书馆的使命是为您提供获取知识的途径。图书馆的主要服务包括：

source:
* Good transport infrastructure, including bicycles and easy transportation on the Skolkovo territory.
* Food & shopping locations, including grocery stores, cafés, restaurants and many other things. There are some malls for shopping and entertainment within a comfortable driving distance.
* Skolkovo sports & recreation facilities and parks
* Separate garbage collection and utilization
The Palisad Dormitory has 5 types of apartments, which are categorized based on the students' level of studies and status (Master's, PhD, families, etc.). Palisad does not have an opportunity for single accommodation.
translation:
* 交通便利，包括自行车和在斯科尔科沃区域内便捷的交通工具。
* 餐饮和购物场所，包括杂货店、咖啡馆、餐馆和许多其他设施。附近有一些购物和娱乐中心，开车即可到达。
* 斯科尔科沃体育和休闲设施以及公园
* 垃圾分类收集和利用
The Palisad Dormitory has 5 types of apartments, which are categorized based on the students' level of studies and status (Master's, PhD, families, etc.). Palisad does not have an opportunity for single accommodation.

source: → Then, at Slavyansky Bulvar, you’ll need to make a connection to the MCD station with the same name and go in the direction of Odintsovo.
translation: 然后，在斯拉夫大街站，您需要换乘同名的MCD线路，并前往奥金佐沃方向。

source:
- Plan your route from the airport to your accommodation in advance. Some travel options are listed below.
- Learn a few Russian words before your trip. There’s a link to a site with Russian words that should get you started. While it’s likely that most people on your way to Skoltech will try to understand and help you, they always appreciate a smart and respectful traveler :)
- Study the culture and history of Russia at least on a basic level. Some information is available below.
- If you take any special prescription medicine, check that it will be available in Russia. Bring enough with you as well.
- Prepare to enjoy your time\! A positive mindset will set you up for success before you even arrive.
Upon your arrival in Moscow, you’ll probably want to go to your accommodation and relax. No matter what accommodation type you will have booked (we’ll talk about it in the next section), here are some general tips on how to navigate the city of Moscow on your first day. To start, in the description, you can find links to files you may need to access quickly
translation:
- 提前规划好从机场到住宿的路线。下面列出了一些出行方式。
- 在出行前学习一些俄语单词。这里有一个俄语单词网站链接，可以帮助你入门。虽然你前往斯科尔科沃科技学院途中大多数人都会尝试理解并帮助你，但他们始终欣赏聪明和尊重的旅行者:)
- 至少在基本层面上学习俄罗斯的文化和历史。下面提供了一些信息。
- 如果你服用任何特殊处方药，请检查其在俄罗斯是否可用。也请携带足够的药量。
-  准备好享受你的时光！积极的心态会在你到达之前就让你成功。
到达莫斯科后，你可能想去你的住处休息一下。无论你预订的是哪种类型的住宿（我们将在下一节中讨论），以下是一些关于如何在第一天游览莫斯科市的建议。首先，在说明中，你可以找到一些你可能需要快速访问的文件链接

source: Married couples and Families are being accommodated in studios with a maximum capacity of 2\. Children of up to 18 y.o. could be accommodated free of charge together with their parents in case of confirmed family accommodation. Additional beds for children are not provided and are subject to your own responsibility. Studios for families with children and for married couples are similar in space and configuration.
translation: 已婚夫妇和家庭可入住最多可容纳2人的单间公寓。18岁以下儿童可与父母一起免费入住（需确认家庭住宿）。不提供儿童加床，加床需自行负责。带儿童的家庭和已婚夫妇的单间公寓在空间和配置上相似。

source: You will have full freedom of movement, set your own schedule, choose your preferred location, number of rooms and so on. But, this also means that you will need to cover the rental costs yourself, connect with your landlord, sign the lease agreements, and take care of your government migration documentation independently. You will search for an apartment independently, however, we are here to provide informational assistance for you to help you find the most convenient and comfortable place to stay. According to Russia's Federal Law of Migration, each international student/tourist/visitor should be registered. It is a lengthy bureaucratic process required for all visitors.
translation: 您将拥有完全的行动自由，自行安排时间表，选择您偏好的地点、房间数量等等。但是，这也意味着您需要自行承担租金，与房东联系，签署租赁协议，并独立办理政府移民文件。您将独立寻找公寓，但是，我们在这里为您提供信息帮助，以帮助您找到最方便舒适的住所。根据俄罗斯联邦移民法，每位国际学生/游客/访问者都应进行登记。这是一个漫长的官僚程序，对所有访问者都是必需的。

source:
* In late August/early September, you received an email about setting up your Skoltech user account, which included your university email (it will end with @skoltech.ru) and account information for internal systems. We hate to state the obvious, but if you’ve made it to Canvas with these credentials and instructions \- congratulations, it worked\!
* When you arrive on campus, you can connect your devices to the Skoltech Wi-Fi. There will be a few lines to choose from, including a 5G one. Use your Skoltech credentials to connect.
* If you need to access a resource available only through Skoltech’s local net, you can [request access to the Skoltech VPN](https://helpdesk.skoltech.ru/servicedesk/customer/portal/4/create/70).
* For general IT-related questions and requests, select an appropriate category on [IT Helpdesk](https://helpdesk.skoltech.ru/servicedesk/customer/portal/4) and submit your question.
* Also while you are on campus, check out [these instructions](https://wiki.skoltech.ru/display/ITC/Wiki+for+Customers) on the Skoltech Wiki site about things like getting a VPN, changing your password and more.
* As for available student software licenses…well, there’s a lot\! You can request a full list of available software for students from the Education Office (contact them at education@skoltech.ru) or go ahead and fill a request [via HelpDesk](https://helpdesk.skoltech.ru/servicedesk/customer/portal/4/create/115?q=software\&q\_time=1654691133740).
* If you need to print something on campus, use [this guideline](https://wiki.skoltech.ru/display/ITC/FollowMe+System) to connect to the printers (access them from the campus or via Skoltech VPN).
Skoltech on social media:
translation:
* 八月末/九月初，您收到了一封关于设置Skoltech用户帐户的电子邮件，其中包含您的大学邮箱（以@skoltech.ru结尾）和内部系统的帐户信息。我们不想说些显而易见的事情，但如果您已使用这些凭据和说明登录Canvas——恭喜您，成功了！
* 到达校园后，您可以将您的设备连接到Skoltech Wi-Fi。将会有几条线路可供选择，包括一条5G线路。使用您的Skoltech凭据连接。
* 如果您需要访问仅通过Skoltech本地网络才能访问的资源，您可以[申请访问Skoltech VPN](https://helpdesk.skoltech.ru/servicedesk/customer/portal/4/create/70)。
* 对于一般的IT相关问题和请求，请在[IT Helpdesk](https://helpdesk.skoltech.ru/servicedesk/customer/portal/4)上选择合适的类别并提交您的问题。
* 在校园期间，请查看Skoltech Wiki网站上关于获取VPN、更改密码等的[这些说明](https://wiki.skoltech.ru/display/ITC/Wiki+for+Customers)。
* 关于可用的学生软件许可证……有很多！您可以向教务处索取完整的学生可用软件列表（联系邮箱：education@skoltech.ru），或直接通过[HelpDesk](https://helpdesk.skoltech.ru/servicedesk/customer/portal/4/create/115?q=software\&q_time=1654691133740)提交请求。
* 如果您需要在校园打印东西，请使用[此指南](https://wiki.skoltech.ru/display/ITC/FollowMe+System)连接到打印机（从校园或通过Skoltech VPN访问）。

translation: 去俄罗斯旅行前你应该做的事情：

source: You will need to carry several documents with you to prove your stay in the country is legal.
translation: 您需要携带几份文件以证明您在该国的居留合法。

source: Migration sounds serious, but in reality, this term is used for anyone who is moving to Russia from abroad. In order to do it right (and legally), you will need to take care of a few registration processes when you arrive. Skoltech’s International Student Support team will help you with that.
translation: 迁移听起来很严重，但实际上，这个词用于指任何从国外搬到俄罗斯的人。为了正确（且合法）地做到这一点，抵达后您需要办理一些注册手续。Skoltech的国际学生支持团队将帮助您完成这些手续。

source: To make it easy for you to navigate Moscow, we have compiled a list of navigation apps for you. Download them *before* your trip\! To navigate the metro you will need the [Yandex Metro](https://mobile.yandex.ru/apps/android/metro) app, for navigation in public transport you will need a [Yandex Maps app](https://mobile.yandex.ru/apps/android/maps)
translation: 为了方便您在莫斯科出行，我们为您整理了一份导航应用列表。请在出行*之前*下载！乘坐地铁您需要[Yandex Metro](https://mobile.yandex.ru/apps/android/metro) 应用，乘坐公共交通工具您需要[Yandex Maps app](https://mobile.yandex.ru/apps/android/maps)

source: Renting a flat can be tricky, so here are a few tips before you get started:
translation: 租房可能很棘手，所以在你开始之前，这里有一些小贴士：

source: 1. Within 7 working days of arrival (30 for students from CIS countries) you have to get a registration slip that confirms your residential address in Russia (more info will follow)
translation: 1. 到达后7个工作日内（独联体国家学生为30个工作日内），您必须获得一张确认您在俄罗斯居住地址的登记单（更多信息随后提供）

source: 4. Enter Russia at least 2 months before this visa expires
translation: 4. 在签证过期前至少提前两个月进入俄罗斯

source: While making your request, select the entire academic year as the duration of your stay (unless you know exactly you are leaving for mobility or any other trip earlier). Otherwise, we cannot guarantee an extension after the date you’ve indicated as your departure date. Later our Dormitory Head Irina Morozova will contact you and tell you about further steps. [Here](http://box.skoltech.ru/index.php/s/OCyRCqveR7dFwsn) you can find specific regulations for student accommodation.
translation: 在提出申请时，请选择整个学年作为您的住宿期限（除非您确切知道您要提前离开进行交流或其他旅行）。否则，我们无法保证在您指定的离开日期之后延期。稍后，我们的宿舍主管Irina Morozova 将会联系您，并告知您后续步骤。[Here](http://box.skoltech.ru/index.php/s/OCyRCqveR7dFwsn)您可以找到学生住宿的具体规定。

source: You must also provide a scan copy of the registration slip to the Skoltech Migration specialist ASAP
translation: 您也必须尽快向Skoltech移民专家提供注册单的扫描件

source: → The stop you’ll need is called Skolkovo \- does that sound familiar? :)

source:
* you will be given one at the airport customs as soon as you arrive.
* Your purpose of travel should state “Education”
* The arrival date must have an official stamp on it
* Russian spelling of your name should be the same as in your visa
* You must provide a scan copy of this card to migrationDOCS@skoltech.ru ASAP.
Registration Slip: confirms your address of stay with the exact dates of arrival and departure
translation:
* 入境后您会在机场海关获得一张。
* 旅行目的应填写“教育”
* 入境日期必须有官方印章
* 您的俄语姓名应与签证上的姓名相同
* 您必须尽快将此卡的扫描件发送至migrationDOCS@skoltech.ru。
Registration Slip: confirms your address of stay with the exact dates of arrival and departure

source:
3. Within 90 days of arrival, you will need to pass a mandatory registration for incoming international citizens.  * You will need to submit your fingerprint scans and a photo at a special registration center
* The costs will be reimbursed to you in your scholarship
* Skoltech will inform you about the process, provide instructions and organize the trip together with other international students when you arrive.
* Not required for international students who have permanent residency (if you arrived via a single-entry visa, you don’t have it and will need to participate in the registration).
When you begin living in Moscow:
translation:
3. 到达后 90 天内，您需要参加强制性国际公民注册。
* 您需要在指定的注册中心提交您的指纹扫描和照片
* 费用将从您的奖学金中报销
* 您到达后，Skoltech 将告知您流程，提供指导，并与其他国际学生一起安排行程。
* 对拥有永久居留权的国际学生（如果您是通过单次入境签证到达，则您不具备永久居留权，需要参加注册）无需此项。
When you begin living in Moscow:

Then go to the Multifunctional Center or Ministry of Internal Affairs (MVD) office in your district in Moscow together with your landlord

You must receive the registration slip within

source: If you’re going to travel outside the borders of the Russian Federation, your checklist will look a little different:
translation: 如果您要前往俄罗斯联邦境外旅行，您的清单会有所不同：

source: Russia is a huge and beautiful country with rich culture, history and people. Make sure to dedicate some time to exploring it and travel around it. The next section in this module will cover some key destinations and attractions, but right now let’s take care of the formalities.
translation: 俄罗斯是一个巨大而美丽的国家，拥有丰富的文化、历史和人民。一定要留出一些时间去探索它，环游它。本模块的下一部分将介绍一些重要的目的地和景点，但现在让我们先处理一些手续。

source: 2) *stay in hotels:*
translation: 2) *入住酒店:*

source:
* By taxi: If you don't want to worry about taking public transport on your first day, you can always order a taxi directly from the airport or the railway station directly to the Skoltech dormitories or your planned accommodation. We recommend using the [Uber App](https://support-uber.com/) or [Yandex Taxi](https://taxi.yandex.ru/ru\_ru/) (which have open access to the Skolkovo territory). You’ll see the price in advance, would be able to choose the type of the vehicle (considering your bags) and can pay by credit card if you don't have cash on you yet.
* By public transport: It’s likely your flight will land in one of Moscow’s key airports: Vnukovo, Sheremetyevo or Domodedovo. All three airports have an [Aeroexpress train](https://aeroexpress.ru/en/aero/schedule.html) that connects the airports to major metro stations. The Aeroexpress leaves approximately every 30 minutes and requires a separate ticket, which you can purchase in front of the entrance to the train platform.
→ As you arrive at the final stop of the Aeroexpress train (which will be in the center of the city), walk over to the closest metro station (marked with a big red M), look at the metro map and travel to the metro station closest to your accommodation. You can use the[Yandex Metro](https://mobile.yandex.ru/apps/android/metro)  app to plan your route.
translation:
* 出租车：如果您不想在第一天担心乘坐公共交通工具，您可以随时从机场或火车站直接叫出租车到斯科尔科沃科技学院宿舍或您计划入住的住宿地点。我们建议您使用[Uber App](https://support-uber.com/)或[Yandex Taxi](https://taxi.yandex.ru/ru_ru/)（这两个应用都可以进入斯科尔科沃地区）。您会提前看到价格，可以选择车辆类型（考虑您的行李），如果您没有现金，也可以用信用卡支付。
* 公共交通工具：您的航班很可能会降落在莫斯科的主要机场之一：伏努科沃、谢列梅捷沃或多莫杰多沃。所有三个机场都有[机场快线](https://aeroexpress.ru/en/aero/schedule.html)连接机场和主要的地铁站。机场快线大约每30分钟发车一次，需要单独购票，您可以在火车站台入口处购买。
→ 当您到达机场快线的终点站（位于市中心）时，走到最近的地铁站（标有红色大写的M），查看地铁线路图，然后前往离您住宿地点最近的地铁站。您可以使用[Yandex Metro](https://mobile.yandex.ru/apps/android/metro)应用程序规划路线。

source: By the way, once you leave Moscow, your registration in Moscow stops and should be made again upon your return. So as you find new accommodation (both short- and long- term), make sure to fix a new registration fee and provide it to Skoltech).
translation: 顺便说一句，一旦你离开莫斯科，你在莫斯科的登记就会停止，你需要在你返回后重新登记。因此，当你找到新的住所（短期和长期）时，请确保支付新的登记费并将其提供给Skoltech。

source: If you travel or change your accommodation, please inform the Skoltech Migration Office [via HelpDesk](https://helpdesk.skoltech.ru/servicedesk/customer/portal/28/create/300?q=migration\&q\_time=1655721012395)
translation: 如果您出行或更换住宿，请告知Skoltech移民办公室 [via HelpDesk](https://helpdesk.skoltech.ru/servicedesk/customer/portal/28/create/300?q=migration\&q_time=1655721012395)

source: Also of course sport clubs (which, at the same time, are official student sport teams: football, basketball, volleyball and others. Fun fact: every autumn, the students of Skoltech gather together for a Club Fair and hold a showcase of available and new clubs you can join. Stay tuned, the Student Council will announce the registration and the dates for this year’s Club Fair in September-October 2022\.  At the Club Fair you can look for existing clubs or present your own new one, though that will take some prep work beforehand. Skoltech will support your club and even provide financinacing (if needed) with proper reasons:) How to start your own club at Skoltech
translation: 当然还有体育俱乐部（同时也是官方学生体育队：足球、篮球、排球等。有趣的事实：每年秋天，Skoltech 的学生们都会聚集在一起参加俱乐部博览会，并展示可加入的现有和新的俱乐部。敬请关注，学生会将于 2022 年 9 月至 10 月宣布今年俱乐部博览会的注册和日期。在俱乐部博览会上，您可以寻找现有俱乐部或展示您自己的新俱乐部，但这需要提前做一些准备工作。Skoltech 将支持您的俱乐部，并在有正当理由的情况下提供资金（如有需要）：）如何在 Skoltech 成立自己的俱乐部

source: Speaking of Hosting Culture, here’s what you need to know.
translation: 说到待客文化，你需要知道这些。

translation: 3月8日——国际妇女节；

translation: *Graphic: Yandex Transport icon*

source: Moving on to grocery shopping.
translation: 接下来是去买菜。

source: *Text Overlay: Public transportation*
translation: *文字叠加：公共交通*

source: Moscow’s public transportation system is extremely well-developed.
translation: 莫斯科的公共交通系统非常发达。

source: Holidays are a big part of Russian culture. Not only are they a reason to gather together with family and friends, but most of them also carry symbolic (and even patriotic) meaning related to history.
translation: 假期是俄罗斯文化的重要组成部分。它们不仅是家人和朋友聚在一起的理由，而且大多数假期都带有与历史相关的象征性（甚至是爱国主义的）意义。

source: *Graphic: Yandex Taxi, Citimobil, Uber icons.*
translation: *Graphic: Yandex Taxi, Citimobil, Uber icons.*

source: Your academic (or professional) calendar will most likely revolve around these key holidays. If a holiday falls on a weekend, the following Monday is generally a day off as well. However, keep an eye on your academic calendar and announcements to get the most current information regarding days off.
translation: 你的学术（或职业）日程表很可能围绕着这些重要节假日。如果节假日恰逢周末，那么接下来的星期一通常也是休息日。但是，请关注你的学术日程表和公告，以获取关于休假日的最新信息。

source: Here are some of the most popular independent scholarships students have applied for previously:
translation: 以下是学生以前申请的一些最受欢迎的独立奖学金：

source: *Text Overlay: Ethnic and religious diversity*
translation: *文字叠加：民族和宗教多样性*

source: Russians respect religious holidays, but their favorite one is the non-religious New Year’s Eve. The second most popular holiday is again, not a religious one, but Victory Day.
translation: 俄罗斯人尊重宗教节日，但他们最喜欢的节日是非宗教的新年前夜。第二个最受欢迎的节日同样是非宗教节日——胜利日。

source: If you have been invited by somebody in Russia, you should not say no to the food offered by the host. You should respectfully accept the food offered because refusal to eat is considered offensive (at the same time, don’t eat it at all if you don’t want to, of course :) . Also, you must bring something as a gift for the host because coming without anything is considered bad here.
translation: 如果你被俄罗斯人邀请，你不应该拒绝主人提供的食物。你应该恭敬地接受提供的食物，因为拒绝吃饭被认为是冒犯的（同时，如果你不想吃，当然也可以不吃:)）。此外，你必须带些东西作为礼物送给主人，因为空手而来在这里被认为是不好的。

source: Others may refer to the idea and symbolism of a shared Russian ‘soul’ (dusha). This explains the soul as the combination of one’s heart, mind and culture, and the uniting point making Russians a cohesive ‘people’ (narod) despite their differences.
translation: 其他人可能会提到共享的俄罗斯“灵魂”（dusha）的理念和象征意义。这将灵魂解释为一个人的内心、思想和文化的结合，以及使俄罗斯人成为一个具有凝聚力的“民族”（narod）的统一点，尽管他们之间存在差异。

source: Your trip will most likely start from a big transport hub, like the airport / railway station. There should be free WI-FI in case your home service provider doesn't allow you to connect to a cell network in Moscow. We recommend visiting an official shop of any Russian mobile network (MTS (links to an external site), Megafon (links to an external site), Beeline (links to an external site), Tele2 (links to an external site)) and purchasing a SIM-card. You will need to show your passport. The probability that staff of such shops in airports or in railway stations speak English is higher than anywhere else.
translation: 您的旅程很可能从大型交通枢纽开始，例如机场/火车站。如果您的国内服务提供商不允许您连接莫斯科的蜂窝网络，则应提供免费无线网络。我们建议您访问任何俄罗斯移动网络的官方商店（MTS (links to an external site)，Megafon (links to an external site)，Beeline (links to an external site)，Tele2 (links to an external site)）并购买一张SIM卡。您需要出示护照。机场或火车站这类商店的工作人员说英语的概率比其他任何地方都高。

source: Most of the traditional dishes are eaten hot. Think of borsch, the red soup, and pelmeni \- traditional dumplings. Most dishes are accompanied with rye bread. Traditionally and historically, Russians welcomed dear guests with a loaf of bread and salt. It’s still done at some weddings. The most popular drink is not vodka, it’s tea\! Learn the most popular Russian dishes and make sure to try them during your stay here.
translation: 大多数传统菜肴都是热吃的。想想罗宋汤，这种红色的汤，还有 пельмени——传统的饺子。大多数菜肴都配黑麦面包。传统上，历史上，俄罗斯人用面包和盐欢迎尊贵的客人。有些婚礼上仍然这样做。最受欢迎的饮料不是伏特加，而是茶！学习最受欢迎的俄罗斯菜肴，并确保在您逗留期间尝试它们。

source: Whether you are a seasoned traveler or not, learning about your destination’s culture, its people and history is a must. First of all, knowing some cultural habits will help you adapt easier (and avoid some awkward or offensive situations). Second, it’s simply a respectful thing to do. For example, you can’t assume that everyone speaks your native language or English and will adapt to your needs when you’re in a different country, right? :) Usually, it’s the other way around. This section will walk you through some interesting features of Russian culture. We’ll start with the language.
translation: 无论您是经验丰富的旅行者还是新手，了解目的地的文化、人民和历史都是必须的。首先，了解一些文化习惯将帮助您更容易地适应（并避免一些尴尬或冒犯的情况）。其次，这仅仅是一件尊重的事情。例如，您不能假设每个人都会说您的母语或英语，并且会在您身处不同的国家时适应您的需求，对吧？:) 通常情况下，情况正好相反。本节将带您了解俄罗斯文化的一些有趣特征。我们将从语言开始。

source: People of all religions and nationalities are respected and welcome in Russia. You may find multiple options for religious congregations around the city and use the Multi Faith Prayer and Meditation room on the Skoltech campus any time.
translation: 俄罗斯欢迎尊重所有宗教和国籍的人。您可以在城市周围找到多个宗教团体的选择，并随时使用斯科尔科沃科技学院校园的多信仰祈祷和冥想室。

translation: *文字叠加：食物*

source: *Text Overlay: Grocery shopping*
translation: *文字叠加：杂货购物*

source: Yandex Maps are your best friend for navigating the city. You can plan your routes, see bus schedules (and moving buses), read and leavelocation reviews and more. This service is best adapted to the streets of Moscow and Russia. Download the app and use it when you need to.
translation: Yandex地图是您在城市中导航的最佳伙伴。您可以规划路线，查看公交车时刻表（以及正在行驶的公交车），阅读和留下位置评论等等。此服务最适合莫斯科和俄罗斯的街道。下载应用程序并在需要时使用它。

source: [Skoltech’s Basic and Development Programs (links to an external site)](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1yt9HSVYroQ-zy9bAq2FSjOJ3ijRtGlxa/edit?usp=sharing\&ouid=102927277179891419108\&rtpof=true\&sd=true)

source: Finally, if you are in a huge rush, feel free to catch a taxi. Watch out if you’re traveling to the campus, as not all services have automatic access to the Skolkovo Territory. Here’s a quick list of apps you can use: яндекс такси, ситимобил, убер.
translation: 最后，如果您非常赶时间，可以随时打车。如果您前往校园，请注意，并非所有服务都能自动进入斯科尔科沃园区。以下是可以使用的应用程序列表：яндекс такси, ситимобил, убер.

source: When you arrive:
translation: 到达后：

source:
* **Always put your safety first.** If you don’t feel comfortable with a landlord or something feels off, follow your instincts and leave.
* Remember, **not every landlord will be able to speak English**. This might be a reason for them to decline your rental request.
* Make sure that your **landlord makes a registration slip** for you (more on that in the Migration section).
* **Read the lease agreement** before signing it. You can ask Skoltech to check out your lease agreement or offer the landlord to use [this template](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1zTocaxg1RAd88ym3WJXwYYtf4gOB4A0Q/view?usp=sharing). Be careful and **do not pay any deposits before signing the lease agreement** or before you see the landlord and the apartment itself. Do not click on suspicious links. To learn more information on how to protect yourself, [read this article](https://www.cian.ru/stati-chto-proverit-pered-tem-kak-snjat-kvartiru-218384/), as well as some recommendations [here](https://www.cian.ru/stati-instruktsija-kak-raspoznat-fejkovoe-objavlenie-325224/?utm\_source=massovie\&utm\_medium=push\&utm\_campaign=push\_b2c\_raspoznat\_fejkovoe\_objavlenie\_24\_05\_22) . Or, you can [check out the blacklist of landlords in Moscow](http://mosfo.ru/nedvizhimost-moskvy/chyornyj-spisok-arendodatelej-moskvy)  (yes, it exists).
**Migration Rules**
translation:
* **始终将您的安全放在首位。**如果您对房东感到不舒服或感觉不对劲，请遵循您的直觉并离开。
* 请记住，**并非每个房东都能说英语**。这可能是他们拒绝您的租赁申请的原因。
* 确保您的**房东为您制作登记单**（更多信息请参见“移民”部分）。
* **在签署租赁协议之前阅读租赁协议**。您可以请Skoltech查看您的租赁协议，或建议房东使用[此模板](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1zTocaxg1RAd88ym3WJXwYYtf4gOB4A0Q/view?usp=sharing)。请务必小心，**在签署租赁协议之前或在您看到房东和公寓本身之前，不要支付任何押金**。不要点击可疑链接。要了解有关如何保护自己的更多信息，请[阅读此文章](https://www.cian.ru/stati-chto-proverit-pered-tem-kak-snjat-kvartiru-218384/)，以及[此处](https://www.cian.ru/stati-instruktsija-kak-raspoznat-fejkovoe-objavlenie-325224/?utm_source=massovie&utm_medium=push&utm_campaign=push_b2c_raspoznat_fejkovoe_objavlenie_24_05_22) 的一些建议。或者，您可以[查看莫斯科房东黑名单](http://mosfo.ru/nedvizhimost-moskvy/chyornyj-spisok-arendodatelej-moskvy)（是的，它存在）。
**Migration Rules**

source: It’s the 8th most spoken language in the world with about 154 million native speakers. It uses the Cyrillic alphabet. Learn some letters before you travel . Middle names and nouns have genders. Russian is the language of space. International astronauts have to learn both English and Russian to do their space-related work. Skoltech has a Russian club where you can master the basics and a little more\! Another important part of language here is proverbs. People use them a lot here when the situation arises. The trick to understanding them is you can never translate them literally. You can find the Cyrillic alphabet and a site with Russian idioms in the description.
translation: 它是世界上第八大常用语言，约有1.54亿母语使用者。它使用西里尔字母。旅行前学习一些字母。中间名和名词有性别。俄语是太空的语言。国际宇航员必须学习英语和俄语才能从事与太空相关的的工作。Skoltech有一个俄语俱乐部，你可以在那里掌握基础知识以及更多！这里的另一个重要语言部分是谚语。人们在情况出现时经常使用它们。理解它们的诀窍是你永远不能逐字翻译它们。你可以在描述中找到西里尔字母表和一个包含俄语习语的网站。

source: Pyaterochka Vkusvill Perekrestok Magnolia Auchan Lenta Metro
translation: пятерочка ВкусВилл Перекресток Магнолия Ашан Лента METRO

source: You can also visit the official websites of the chain stores listed above and order directly from them.

source: Oh, almost forgot\! When it gets warmer, you can rent electric scooters and bikes all around the city (and even in the Skolkovo Territory). If you see a little parking lot with scooters or bikes, look for a QR code to download its app and reserve yourself a machine. The system will tell you how long you have rented it for, its charge (if it’s electric) and the nearest parking location. Just watch out for those puddles\!
translation: 哦，差点忘了！天气暖和起来后，你可以在全城（甚至斯科尔科沃地区）租用电动滑板车和自行车。如果你看到一个小小的停车场停放着滑板车或自行车，那就找一下二维码，下载它的应用程序并预订一辆车。系统会告诉你租用了多久，电量（如果是电动的）以及最近的停车位置。小心水坑！

source:
- Write to migrationdocs@Skoltech.ru to check if there are any entrance restrictions with the country you are traveling to.
- Buy flight tickets with a return date. However if you are going to buy a one-way ticket, check that there are available tickets to your coming back.
- Inform the Migration Office 3 days in advance about your personal trips and change of accommodation [via Helpdesk](https://helpdesk.skoltech.ru/servicedesk/customer/portal/28/create/300?q=migration\&q\_time=1655721012395)
- Check if your destination country need a valid PCR test.
And of course, all of this material can be found below the video.

- 购买往返机票。但是，如果您要购买单程票，请检查是否有返回的机票。

- 检查您的目的地国家是否需要有效的PCR检测。
And of course, all of this material can be found below the video.

source: If you do not need a visa to enter Russia (if you’re from a CIS country, for example), you will still need to leave and return, indicating a new purpose of stay at the customs.
translation: 如果您不需要签证进入俄罗斯（例如，如果您来自独联体国家），您仍然需要离开并返回，并在海关说明新的停留目的。

source: However, Skoltech can help you stay in Russia for a few extra weeks after graduation. You can file a request for a vacation via the Education Office and get a quick extension to wrap up your travels and check some items off your bucket list ;)
translation: 然而，Skoltech可以帮助你毕业后在俄罗斯多待几周。你可以通过教育办公室申请假期，并快速获得延期，以便完成你的旅行，并完成你的一些愿望清单上的项目 ;)

source: This information will be communicated to you closer to your graduation, so you don’t need to think about it too hard right now. Instead, focus on the time and experience you will be getting at Skoltech as a student starting September. Now that will be a time to remember\!
translation: 这些信息会在你毕业前夕告知你，所以你现在不必过于担心。相反，专注于你从九月开始作为斯科尔科沃科技学院的学生将获得的时间和经验。那将是值得铭记的时光！

source: So you want to stay in Russia after graduation? That’s a long time away, so let’s do a quick overview of how you can make it possible when you are ready.
translation: 所以你想毕业后留在俄罗斯？那还很久以后的事，所以让我们快速概述一下你准备好后如何做到这一点。

source: **How to request a spot in the dormitories**
translation: **如何申请宿舍床位**

source: Luckily you guys will have your own healthcare plans. You may also find apothecaries (apteka/аптека) all around the city to get basic medicine or fill a prescription from your doctor. You can use the Yandex Maps app to find the closest apteka to you.
translation: 幸运的是，你们会有自己的医疗保险。你们也可能会在城市周围找到药房(apteka/аптека)购买基本药品或领取医生开的处方药。您可以使用Yandex地图应用程序查找离您最近的apteka。

source: You will be legally required to leave the country within 3 days of graduation, even if your visa doesn’t expire for a while. The reason for that is your purpose of stay will change \- you will no longer be a student :(
translation: 你将在毕业后3天内被法律要求离开该国，即使你的签证还有一段时间才过期。原因是你的停留目的将改变——你将不再是学生了 :(

source: 2. We recommend choosing to stay in hotels vs. private apartments, since hotels will provide:
translation: 2. 我们建议选择入住酒店而非私人公寓，因为酒店将提供：

source: 3. Please send the photocopy of your new hotel registration slip to migrationDOCS@skoltech.ru
translation: 3. 请将您新的酒店登记单复印件发送至migrationDOCS@skoltech.ru

source: If you wish to return for any reason \- like if you get a job offer or simply want to relax here for a few months \- you will need to go to your home country and get a new visa that aligns with your new purpose of stay.
translation: 如果您想出于任何原因返回——例如您获得工作机会或只是想在这里放松几个月——您需要前往您的祖国，获得与您新的逗留目的相符的新签证。

source: Should you want to travel outside of Russia, that’s cool too\! Here’s what you should do to ensure a comfortable return:
translation: 如果你想前往俄罗斯以外的地方旅行，那也很酷！以下是确保舒适返回所需做的事情：

source: 1. Write to migrationdocs@Skoltech.ru to check if there are any entrance restrictions with the country you are traveling to.
translation: 1. 写信到 migrationdocs@Skoltech.ru 咨询您前往的国家是否有任何入学限制。

source: Russia is a huge and beautiful country with rich culture, history and people. Make sure to dedicate some time to exploring it and travel around it. The next section in this module will cover some key destinations and attractions, but right now let’s take care of the formalities.
translation: 俄罗斯是一个巨大而美丽的国家，拥有丰富的文化、历史和人民。一定要留出一些时间去探索它，环游它。本模块的下一部分将介绍一些重要的目的地和景点，但现在让我们先处理一些手续。

source: Ah, the fun stuff\! Unless you think finding groceries is fun, too. Then we won’t judge. The city of Moscow and the entire country have loads of places to explore. From historic locations to restaurants and museums, you’ll find something to your liking here. There is always something going on: concerts, festivals, markets and more. And the nightlife…well, it’s another city that never sleeps\! The article below has the best resources for getting to know Moscow.
translation: 啊，有趣的东西！除非你也觉得找杂货很有趣。那样的话，我们不会评判你。莫斯科市和整个国家有很多地方可以探索。从历史遗迹到餐馆和博物馆，你都能在这里找到你喜欢的。这里总是有事情发生：音乐会、节日、市场等等。还有夜生活……好吧，这是另一个不夜城！下面的文章提供了了解莫斯科的最佳资源。

source: so [here are a few](http://masterrussian.com/proverbs/russian\_proverbs.htm) to tickle your mind.

source: 6. If you decide to stay in Russia after you finish your studies, you can request a vacation period and enjoy summer activities in Moscow and beyond till the end of August.
translation: 6. 如果你决定在完成学业后留在俄罗斯，你可以申请休假，并在莫斯科及其他地区享受夏季活动，直到八月底。

source: The buses, metro, trains and other city-sponsored modes of transfer are integrated by one system. You can buy yourself single- or double-ride tickets or get a permanent Troika card and top off its balance every once in a while. If you’re planning to explore the city center, we recommend using the underground metro. Yandex Metro app (links to an external site)has the current map and allows you to plan your route to point A to point B. The metro is designed in a sun-like way, with multi-colored lines stemming away from the center outwards. There are also several circle lines which connect them. You will notice on the map (and have already seen it mentioned in this course) the MCD lines. These are newer extensions of the metro line that take you a little bit outside of the city for a few extra rubles. One of these lines, MCD 1, takes you almost directly to Skoltech and is the best way to get to campus from the city center. If you use the metro app to plan your route, select the stop called “Skolkovo” and it will calculate your route for you. Easy, huh\! If you live or end up far away from a metro station, you can take the bus, a tramway or a small overground shuttle (aka marshrutka). The Yandex Transport app shows you the nearest stops, when the next bus, tram or shuttle will arrive there and where it can take you. You can also plan your route there.
translation: 公交车、地铁、火车和其他城市提供的交通方式都整合在一个系统中。您可以购买单程或双程票，也可以获得一张永久有效的“特洛伊卡”卡，并定期充值。如果您计划探索市中心，我们建议您使用地铁。Yandex地铁应用程序 (links to an external site)拥有最新的地图，并允许您规划从A点到B点的路线。地铁的设计像太阳一样，多条彩色线路从中心向外延伸。还有几条环线将它们连接起来。您会在地图上注意到（在本课程中也已经提到过）MCD线路。这些是地铁线路较新的延伸线，只需支付少量卢布即可带您到城市外围。其中一条线路，MCD 1 线，几乎可直达斯科尔科沃科技学院，是从市中心到达校园的最佳方式。如果您使用地铁应用程序规划路线，请选择名为“斯科尔科沃”的站点，它将为您计算路线。很容易，对吧！如果您居住的地方或最终到达的地方距离地铁站很远，您可以乘坐公交车、电车或小型地面穿梭巴士（又称 маршрутка）。Yandex交通应用程序会显示您最近的车站、下一辆公交车、电车或穿梭巴士何时到达以及它可以带您去哪里。您也可以在那里规划您的路线。

source: The [Yandex Transport app](https://yandex.ru/maps/213/moscow/transport/?ll=37.622504%2C55.753215\&z=12) shows you the nearest stops, when the next bus, tram or shuttle will arrive there and where it can take you.
translation: [Yandex Transport app](https://yandex.ru/maps/213/moscow/transport/?ll=37.622504%2C55.753215\&z=12) 显示您附近的站点、下一班公交车、电车或班车何时到达以及它可以带您去哪里。
